reviews.review_text: Rayovac AA batteries will not fit! I taped cover to hold down but 1 battery leaked, end broke creating hot outside compartment cover! (great value did but only lasted 6 hrs)I didnt try usb plug in. It did keep blowing air in sun porch where ppl smoke to keep from staying still in air, humid weather. As the batteries are dying remember the control button will only work on 2 then 1 then out!

I was looking for a small fan to put on my bedside for white noise. This fan has a light where the button is I didn't care for that and the sound of the fan was not what I was looking for I will be returning item.

reviews.title: NOT RECHARGABLE üò´
reviews.review_text: I didn't realize that it needed batteries. I thought it was rechargeable. I wanted to put it inside the stroller to keep my baby cool. He is only four months. I'm worried about him overheating. Now I have to buy batteries. You can only use it with a cord or with batteries. The necklace fans are great because they're rechargeable, but that's only good for mom. because I can't get the angle right to put it in the stroller. it's dangerous for a baby to be around strings. I will have to go buy some rechargeable batteries because I already threw away the packaging thinking it was rechargeable.

Turning on and staying on‚Ä¶that didn't really happen!! Once I put in the Batteries, they wouldn't stay in ‚Äútheir assigned seating‚Äù lol and kept popping out causing trouble to close it properly. And because of this the fan wouldn't stay on for more than 30 seconds to a minute.

reviews.title: Won't work!
reviews.review_text: If I could give 0 stars, the fan we got won't even work, we got it for my daughter on the go while for when we go to the zoo I put in the batteries to test it, the batteries just fly out won't stay in and it won't even turn on no matter the order the batteries are placed. It was basically a waste of money and wasn't even what we originally wanted but what we wanted wasn't in stock apparently.

reviews.title: A used, broken cable, battery gobbler.
reviews.review_text: I damaged one of my three Honeywell Turbo On The Go Portable Folding Personal fans that this fan is a dupe of. The Honeywell wasn't available, and it being hurricane season, decided to give this one a try. What a mistake. Firstly, when I received the fan it was clear that it had been used and the previous owner had been kind enough to stick the cables severed usb port to a sticky label, so it wouldn't get lost. I decided to try it with batteries which only lasted a few hours, compared to my Honeywells that run for multiple days. Unlike the Honeywell it has multiple speeds. The profile is bigger than the Honeywell, but only has a third of the power. It died after 2 weeks of occasional use and 16 batteries. I'm usually happy with Mainstay products, but this one needs to be pulled from shelves.

reviews.title: disappointed
reviews.review_text: stayed on 5 minutes with brand new batteries and the adapter and "plug" weren't in the box. obviously, I'll be returning it
Very hard to put the batteries in and then it turns off on it's own. Not very quite. it does have good spped and power if iged in..it gets loud

reviews.title: Cool disappointment
reviews.review_text: The fans worked great and then when they needed charged they only Run now when on the charger. I thought it was just a flook but I bought the teal and a white one and they both do it. Very disappointed. My kids planned to use these on our trips in the car.

reviews.title: Mini fan
reviews.review_text: item stopped working after a few uses! Used cheap batteries at first not compatible batteries seemed to be cut bigger for battery compartment. Bought Duracell batteries and after less than an hour fan stopped working, had to use cord (included with fan). eventually the tip of usb cord came detached, had to use a substitute. pro: fan blow out a nice amount of Air but fan stopped working for unknown reason. üòêü´§üßê

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.review_text: This fan eats thru batteries like crazy. Even using a usb charger box. It won't stay on very long. Disappointed

reviews.title: Not even one summer
reviews.review_text: I ordered this in March, and in June it just quits. I mean come on.

reviews.title: wow
reviews.review_text: This fan was spray painted sooo poorly that i couldnt even push the button to start it. my husband laughed so hard at how bad it looked and sent pictures to his friends.

reviews.title: Don't buy it
reviews.review_text: It worked one time. Will turn on then off right away, with brand new batteries. The charging port never worked. Absolutely do not recommend.

reviews.title: Stopped blowing all 3 speeds same day
reviews.review_text: The fan caught on fire after a week of having it

reviews.title: Little airflow and burns through batteries.
reviews.review_text: Little airflow and burns through batteries.

reviews.title: Great fan bad battery life
reviews.review_text: This fan is small, powerful and quiet. If using AA batteries , pack extra. I can't make it through one work day with the battery lasting using it on and off for around 6. Not even with extended life lithium batteries .

reviews.title: Not worth it
reviews.review_text: It does not work, no matter how you stand it or hang it, if you connected or put batteries in it, it will work when it wants too and for a few seconds.

reviews.title: iffy
reviews.review_text: this was a great fan at first but now it doesn't go past the second speed after n hour it wouldn't go past the first speed without dying so im returning it
